column2: "Kaa hɔn ma wɔmbrɛ hɔnho adze mma mpanyimfo
column5: na wonsiesie hɔnho mma edwuma pa biara;"

column4: wɔnyɛ abodwekyɛr na wɔnda ɔdwe nyina edzi wɔ nyimpa nyina do."

column2: "Na hɛn so nkyɛ nkan no yɛyɛ nkwasea
"Na Nyankopɔn hɛn Agyenkwa n’ayamuyie nye no dɔ a ɔwɔ nyimpa do yii noho edzi no
column6: na ɔnam awofofor eguar no nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn foforyɛ do gyee hɛn nkwa."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔnam Jesus Kraest hɛn Agyenkwa do huei guu hɛn do pii
column4: "ma wɔnam n’adom do bu hɛn bem a
column5: yaayɛ onnyiewiei nkwa ho enyidado no adzedzifo."

column3: na iyinom na mepɛ dɛ eka no ɔdzendo
column4: ama hɔn a wɔagye Nyankopɔn edzi aadwen do esuo ndwuma pa mu. Ndzɛmba yi ye na ɔyɛ mfaso ma nyimpa:"

column5: yi woho fi ho; osiandɛ mfaso nnyi ho na wɔyɛ adze gyan."

column2: "Nyia ɔdze mpaapaamu ba a akasa akyerɛ no prɛko nye mpɛn ebien no
"hu dɛ obi a ɔtse dɛm no ɔakyea
column3: ɔyɛ bɔn bu nankasa no ho fɔ."

column2: "Sɛ mosoma Artemas anaa Tikikus wɔ wo nkyɛn a
column3: bɔ mbɔdzen bra me nkyɛn wɔ Nikopolis: na hɔ na mesua me tsirmu dɛ mirikedzi awɔwber."

column2: "Na ma hɛn nkorɔfo so nsua ndwuma pa ho mbɔdzembɔ wɔ dza ohia ho
"Hɔn a wɔwɔ me nkyɛn nyina kyiakyia wo. Kyiakyia hɔn a wɔdɔ hɛn wɔ gyedzi mu no. Adom nka hom nyina."
